headline: Ok
cons: Toilets are not great for a nap

headline: Awful Place (because of some managers)
pros: A lot of smart and decent people willing to share their knowledge.
cons:
The only Con, but a very big one, is working (or even interacting) with the CTO, Alex Baker. 
This person is impossible to please and ready to point out any minute flaw in your work, or even in your opinions! He enjoys making people feel powerless.
